Sugra Visram (15 Julaị 1923 - 29 Ọktoba 2012), nke a makwaara dị ka Sugra Namubiru Visram, bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Uganda, onye na-eme ihe ike na onye ọchụnta ego

Ọ bụ otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị mbụ so na ndị omeiwu nke Kabaka Muteesa nke Abụọ sonyere na Buganda Lukiiko.N'ịbụ onye sonyere na Kabaka Yekka Party, ọ nọchitere anya Kibuga Constituency (Mengo ugbu a) na Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu nke Mbụ na nke Abụọ nke Uganda ruo mgbe ọ gbara arụkwaghịm dị ka onye omeiwu na 1966
Ya na Florence Alice Lubega na Eseza Makumbi, ọ bụ otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị atọ mbụ jere ozi n'ọkwa a na Uganda mgbe nnwere onwe gasịrị.

A mụrụ ya Sugra Jamal na Ụlọ Ọgwụ Nsambya n'aka Mohamedali Jamal, onye Pakistan na Kawkab Aha Mirza nke ndị Iran. Ọ tolitere na Mengo na Old Kampala ma gụọ akwụkwọ na Old Kampa Senior Secondary School

Dị ka ya na di ya na-arụ ọrụ, Visram na-ejikwa ụlọ ahịa uwe ma malite ụlọ akwụkwọ ịkwọ ụgbọala maka ụmụ nwanyị. N'agbata afọ 1950 na 1951, ọ bụ onye isi ụlọ akwụkwọ ọta akara, ụlọ akwụkwọ Ithnasheri, ụlọ akwụkwọ ọt akara.

Visram sonyeere ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na 1962 na ntuli aka Buganda tupu nnwere onwe nke afọ ahụ, a họpụtara Visram na Florence Alice Lubega na Eseza Makumbi na Lukiiko. Mgbe ntuli aka nke afọ 1962 gasịrị, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye nnọchi anya Buganda ka ọ na-anọchite anya Florence Alice Lubega, na-eme ka ha bụrụ ụmụ nwanyị mbụ so n'òtù a. Ọ sonyeere otu ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị Kabaka Yekka (KY) ma nọchite anya mpaghara a maara dị ka "Kibuga" (Mengo taa).

Visram bụ otu n'ime ndị omeiwu ise nke Kabaka Yekka gbara arụkwaghịm n'oche ndị omeiwu ha mgbe ọ jụrụ ịdebanye aha na ndokwa nke iwu ọhụrụ nke e gosipụtara mgbe nnupụisi iwu nke 1966 na Uganda gasịrị.

Ọ bụ onye isi nke Women's Wing nke Kabaka Yekka (KY) na mgbakwunye na ịbụ osote onye isi oche nke Kansụl Uganda maka ụmụ nwanyị nke ọ sonyeere na 1944. Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị guzobere Family Planning Association of Uganda (nke a maara ugbu a dị ka Reproductive Health Uganda) n'afọ 1957
O nyekwara aka guzobe Young Women's Christian Association (YWCA) na Uganda ma bụrụkwa onye na-ahụ maka akụ ya.
Mgbe a chụpụrụ ndị Eshia na Uganda na 1972, Visram rụrụ ọrụ na ngalaba agụmakwụkwọ nke Commonwealth Institute
Ọ na-arụkwa ọrụ na Commonwealth Parliamentary Association na Red Cross.
Ọ laghachiri Uganda na 1993 wee rụọ ọrụ dị ka onye enyemaka onye isi ala pụrụ iche na Inward Investment
Na 1941, Visram lụrụ Haider Visram, nwa nwa Allidina Visram. Ọ nwụrụ na afo otu puku narị itoolu, iri itoolu na asatọ 1998 ma ha nwere ụmụ atọ
A nabatara ya n'ezinụlọ Buganda Mamba ma nye ya aha Namubiru
